entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning with 60 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 this morning. High 15. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
